cards.title: Aethium Vein
body: If this card is destroyed by a hero card and Tak Ahab is in play, place the top card of the villain deck beneath him.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card and Tak Ahab's end of turn effect acts twice this turn.
cards.flavorText: Jack Donovan set the lump of glowing{BR}crystal in front of the mercenary. “So{BR}this is what you're here for, right?{BR}There's something I want you to do.”

cards.title: Alien Fungus
body: Whenever a Frozen card enters play, this card and Tak Ahab each regain 3 HP.
At the end of the environment turn this card deals each hero target 2 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: The mercenary's ship brought with it{BR}several spores of a normally harmless{BR}alien fungus which, like Tak Ahab himself,{BR}thrived dangerously in the frigid climate.

cards.title: Bitter Cold
body: Whenever an environment card enters play, this card deals the target with the third highest HP 2 cold damage.
At the end of each turn, all targets that were dealt cold damage during that turn deal themselves 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: If the cold doesn't kill you,{BR}thinking about the possibility will{BR}make up the difference.

cards.title: Demolished Camp
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck and destroy this card. If Landing Site would enter play, instead remove it from the game.
Increase damage dealt to Tak Ahab by 1. If Tak Ahab is destroyed, remove him from the game.
cards.flavorText: Tango One drew her knife. “You're{BR}going to pay for this,” she said.{BR}Tak Ahab shook his head slowly.{BR}“I'm going to be paid for this.”

cards.title: Eerie Stillness
body: All targets are immune to cold damage.
At the start of the environment turn, search the environment deck and trash for a First, Second, or Third Waypoint card and put it into play, then shuffle the deck and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Something is unnatural here,”{BR}Baccarat said. In response to{BR}Fanatic's raised eyebrow, he added,{BR}“besides us.”

cards.title: Frostbite
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the {H + 1} non-environment targets with the lowest HP 4 cold damage each and is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: The crowbar in Mr. Fixer's hand{BR}was searing cold as the alien{BR}marched towards him. It seemed to{BR}be indifferent to the weather.

cards.title: Frozen Solid
body: When this card enters play, place it next to the hero with the lowest HP. That hero must skip either their play or power phase during their turn. Increase cold damage dealt to that hero by 1.
If that hero is dealt fire damage, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “What's our supply situation?”{BR}asked Bunker. Tango hesitated.{BR}“We've got plenty of water.{BR}Drinking it will be the problem.”

cards.title: Landing Site
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck and destroy this card. If Demolished Camp would enter play, instead remove it from the game.
At the start of the environment turn, if Tak Ahab is in play, you may destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card. If you do, place the top card of any deck beneath Tak Ahab.
cards.flavorText: The mercenary caught site of the{BR}aethium crystal in Starlight's armor.{BR}Slowly, he lowered his weapon. “Perhaps{BR}we can come to an arrangement.”

cards.title: Lost in the Snow
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target 1 cold damage.
At the start of the environment turn, each hero must destroy 1 ongoing and 1 equipment card.
cards.flavorText: “Contact with the Northspar expedition{BR}was lost 2 weeks ago,” said Bunker.{BR}“We're going to find out why. Let's be{BR}careful out there.”

cards.title: Makeshift Shelter
body: This card and Supply Depot are indestructible.
At the start of the environment turn, you may shuffle a card from the environment trash into the deck. if Tak Ahab is in the environment trash, shuffle him into the deck.
cards.flavorText: The group dug through the snow{BR}which had claimed the camp. Havoc, distracted,{BR}kept glancing out into the night. “Do{BR}you hear something movin' out there?”

cards.title: Raging Blizzard
body: At the end of the environment turn, discard the top 4 cards of the environment deck. This card deals each non-environment target X cold damage, where X = the number of Frozen cards discarded this way.
If 4 Frozen cards were discarded this way, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Absolute Zero continued marching{BR}ahead through the driving wind.{BR}“What's everyone complaining{BR}about?”

cards.title: Snow Shrieker
body: Increase fire damage dealt to this card by 2.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second lowest HP X cold damage, where X = 1 plus the number of Frozen cards in the environment trash.
cards.flavorText: Scans of the Northspar region showed{BR}it to be full of strange minerals and{BR}E.M. signals, but scientists believed it to{BR}be too inhospitable for life.

cards.title: Supply Depot
body: Third Waypoint cards are indestructible.
When this card enters play, destroy it and play the top card of the environment deck if Makeshift Shelter is not in play. Otherwise place it next to a hero. They gain:
Power: this hero deals 1 target 1 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: The expedition's second base camp still{BR}contained a stash of survival gear.{BR}Vance found an old gas lantern and{BR}began thawing his suit.

cards.title: Tak Ahab
body: Whenever this card has no cards beneath it, place the top card of each hero deck beneath this one.

At the end of the environment turn, discard a card from beneath this one. This card deals the target from that deck with the highest HP X irreducible sonic damage, where X = the number of Waypoints in play plus 2.
cards.flavorText: “I know he paid you to kill me,” Starlight{BR}shouted from behind cover, “but we need to{BR}talk.” The alien kept his gun level. “Talking{BR}is not usually something I get paid for.”

cards.title: “What's left of them...”
body: When this card enters play, search the environment deck and trash for a First, Second, or Third Waypoint card and put it into play, then shuffle the deck.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target 1 psychic damage and is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: “How do you know the expedition went{BR}this way?” Fanatic yelled over the storm.{BR}Up ahead, Absolute Zero stared at the{BR}frozen bodies and said nothing.
